front.title: IEEE Approved Draft Standard for Environmental Assessment of Imaging Equipment Amendment 1

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: The following three criteria: Required--End-of-life processing requirements (currently 4.6.2.1); Optional--Manufacturer recyclers or reuses toner material collected through its cartridge and container take-back program (currently 4.9.3.2); and Optional--Manufacturer recyclers or reuses plastics collected through its cartridge and container take-back program (currently 4.9.3.3) are revised in this amendment.(The PDF of this standard is available to you at no cost to you, sponsored by Green Electronics Council, through the IEEE GET Program http://ieeexplore.ieee.org/browse/standards/get-program/page/series?id=86)
